entry.title: Forever Together
entry.summary:
Author: PheonixInk

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 747Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 16

Summary: Derek and Stiles sit on their porch, watching their children play under the sunset. Reflecting on the life they’ve built, they are filled with gratitude, love, and awe at how far they’ve comefrom dangerous nights filled with pack battles to this peaceful, beautiful life together.

entry.title: The Alpha's List
entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 69,260Chapters: 25/26Kudos: 321

Summary: In the Game of Love, he Made the Rules. The Honorable Derek Hale, Marquis of Redbridge.He is aristocratic, excessively handsome, excessively wealthy, aloof, reserved, arrogant and the powerful Alpha of one of the most renowned packs in the country. He has been an elusive prize for years, the target of desperate society Omega and their matchmaking mothers. But he is not swayed by flirtatious smiles and fine looks, social climbers and fortune hunters. He wants more.When his lack of an Omega causes concern to his mother, uncle and pack a remedy is suggested in the form of a suitable match. Derek draws up a list of qualifications and attributes for his future mate. Can any Omega hope to win the heart of such a demanding bachelor and cynic?Stiles Stilinski the Omega son of a clergyman can only try his best. The Marquis is not sure whether he has discovered the perfect Omega… Or the been the victim of a cruel hoax.

Summary: (Further continuation of Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU)After defeating their second Goa'uld System Lord in less than a year, the residents of Beacon Hills must adapt to their ever-changing world.Cora Hale has broken the family curse, but now she must continue her work of rehabilitating the Hale-Littlefield Pack while keeping Beacon Hills safe for all its residents.Stiles Stilinski continues his journey of recovery and self-discovery after his possession.Derek Hale faces new challenges as he starts going on offworld missions through the Stargate.

entry.title: Morning Dew
entry.summary:
Author: Samandiriel (kyra516)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,739Chapters: 8/10Kudos: 188

Summary: Stiles had always been a bit of an odd bunny compared to his peers. He had this sense of adventure and the need to explore! His father said he got most of it from his late mother. His father also called it recklessness and lack of self-preservation. Most of the time, Stiles just dismissed his father as being plain wrong.Today however? Today he reckoned his father was completely and truly right in his judgement. Because today, Stiles had made the most reckless and stupid decision of his life. You see, Stiles had the brilliant idea of venturing into wolf lands to do some gathering, and so here he was, on the other side of the river, in the unknown lands that no bunny before him had dared to venture into. What could possibly go wrong?It was all Jackson's fault anyway.

entry.title: The Hunted Heart Never Rests
entry.summary:
Author: SummertimeRadness

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,003Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Stiles comes from a hunter family, and for the last decade, he's spent his summers training to become the perfect killer. All that's left is to get high school over with and be officially initiated into the clan. Of course, he doesn't count on almost dying in the woods, or on being rescued by one of the werewolves his family is sworn to kill.Derek has been on the run with his sisters since hunters burned down his home and everyone in it. When a string of murders draws them back to Beacon Hills, Derek goes looking for a killer in the woods, only to find a helpless, unconscious human instead...

entry.title: Restoration
entry.summary:
Author: leatherandflannel

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,401Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 97

Summary: Out of range of Derek’s enhanced senses, he lets himself reflect on the night before as he drives. The feel of Derek’s hot mouth on his throat, his chest, his mouth. The way his solid frame felt behind Stiles as he stripped him down, as he begged Derek for everything. Begged Derek to stop the ache, fill the need. It was a fire burning him alive from the inside out and Derek’s fingers were the ice cooling him down with each touch. Derek had felt it too, had growled in his ear about all the things he was going to do to him, how his body was made for Derek and only Derek. He makes it to his driveway before he finally lets the tears fall. Sobs wreck his body, and he just lets it out, knowing he’s out of earshot of any nosy wolves. The crying doesn’t help the pain in his body, but it brings a whole new type of pain, the ache in his heart sharp and heavy.

entry.title: The Last Amber Sign: The Price of Survival
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,089Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 5

Summary: In the whispers of the resistance, they say the Linaje are immortal. That the Argents are invincible.But Derek Hale has seen his family’s blood spilled, and the truth is something else.Now, he leads a group of rebels on desperate missions, challenging the shadows that rule the world. But everything changes when an encounter with a stranger — a man who carries secrets more dangerous than death itself — puts at risk something far more dangerous than an end: the chance to change the future.In a game where even magic costs more than any life, Derek will have to decide how far he’s willing to go to destroy the Argent regime... and how much he’s willing to sacrifice to save himself and humanity.
